data.title: Listen on the Radio
data.meta_description: A fun radio show and podcast heard on NPR stations. It's about language change, debates, and differences, plus new words, old sayings, slang, word origins, and more.
data.meta_site_name: A Way with Words, a fun radio show and podcast about language
data.text:

WBFO 88.7 FM out of Buffalo, New York, reaches the cities of Toronto, Hamilton, Burlington, Mississaugu, St. Catharines, Niagra Falles and other towns in Ontario, Canada.
